name: @apps/260122_remotion-voicevox-template
description: Remotion + VOICEVOX動画テンプレート

scripts.start: pnpm run sync && remotion studio src/index.ts --port 3004
scripts.build: pnpm run sync && remotion render src/index.ts Main out/video.mp4
scripts.voices: npx ts-node scripts/generate-voices.ts && pnpm run sync-script
scripts.preview: pnpm run sync && remotion preview src/index.ts --port 3004
scripts.sync: pnpm run sync-settings && pnpm run sync-script
